hero.subtitle: Stack na aikace-aikacen Move na buɗe-tushe wanda ke ba da kayan aikin gaba ɗaya don gina aikace-aikacen da ba su da tushe (DApps) da aikace-aikacen da suke kan sarkar gaba ɗaya.

features.title: Fasaloli
features.mainTitle: Stack na Move tare da Iyawa mara iyaka

moveCompatible.title: 100% mai jituwa da Move
moveCompatible.description: Yi amfani da yanayin da ke akwai na Move don amfanin ku.

zeroGas.title: kudin gas sifili
zeroGas.description: Yana ba da damar aikin ya rufe wannan kashe kudi, yana tallafawa fadada sassauci da daidaitawa.

unlimited.title: Mara iyaka
unlimited.subtitle: Ma'amaloli a cikin dakika
unlimited.description: Ya dogara da adadin tashoshi na dubhe da ke aiki a lokaci guda.

community.title: Al'umma
community.mainTitle: Shiga cikin al'ummar duniya a bayan Dubhe
community.description: Tare da al'ummar masu haɓaka da ke bunƙasa a duk duniya, Dubhe yana samun tallafi daga masu goyon baya masu ƙwazo waɗanda ke jagorantar makomar fasahar blockchain na Move. Haɗu, haɗin gwiwa, kuma ku yi girma tare da mu yayin da muke tsara ƙarni na gaba na hanyoyin rarrabawa.

members.label: Membobin Al'umma
members.description: Masu haɓakawa da masu sha'awar da suke aiki a duk duniya

events.label: Abubuwan Duniya
events.description: Tarurruka, haduwa, da taron bita na shekara-shekara

countries.label: Ƙasashe
countries.description: Kasancewar al'ummar Dubhe a cikin nahiyoyi

hero.title: Tallafa wa ci gaban yanayin Dubhe
hero.subtitle: Ta hanyar tallafin masu haɓakawa, shirye-shiryen yanayin muhalli, da ƙoƙarin rarrabawa, Gidauniyar Dubhe tana taimakawa wajen haɓaka girma da karɓuwa na yanayin ka'idar Dubhe.

mission.title: Manufarmu
mission.subtitle: Saurin Ƙirƙira na Move don Kowa

developerSupport.title: Tallafin Masu Haɓakawa
developerSupport.description: Ba da tallafi, albarkatu, da jagora ga masu haɓakawa da ke ginawa akan yanayin Dubhe. Daga hackathons zuwa tallafin aikin na dogon lokaci.
features: Taron bita na ilimi da hackathons

ecosystemGrowth.title: Ci Gaban Yanayin Muhalli
ecosystemGrowth.description: Haɗin gwiwa na dabaru da shirye-shirye don faɗaɗa yanayin Dubhe. Gina gadoji tsakanin sarƙoƙin Move da ka'idoji daban-daban.
features: Haɗin gwiwa na dabaru da sarƙoƙin Move

decentralization.title: Rarrabawa
decentralization.description: Tabbatar da cewa Yanayin Dubhe ya kasance na gaske ya rarraba ta hanyar gudanarwa, shigar da al'umma, da tsarin yanke shawara na rarraba.
features: Yanke shawara da al'umma ta jagoranta

footer.copyright: © 2025 Dubhe. Duk haƙƙoƙin an kiyaye su.

hero.title: Haɗu da Ƙungiyar Gidauniyar Dubhe
hero.description: Ƙungiyarmu ta bambanta, ta duniya ta masana injiniya, masu bincike, da masu gina al'umma ta yi alkawarin ci gaban yanayin Move da ƙarfafa masu haɓakawa a duk duniya.

leadership.title: Ƙungiyar Jagora
leadership.description: Saduwa da masu hangen nesa da kwararu waɗanda ke jagorantar manufar Dubhe na juyin juya halin haɓakar Move

join.title: Shiga Ƙungiyarmu
join.description: Koyaushe muna neman mutane masu hazaka waɗanda ke da sha'awar ci gaban fasahar blockchain
join.ctaDescription: Tuntuɓa mu game da matsayi da damammaki da ke akwai

engineering.title: Injiniya
engineering.description: Gina makomar kayan aikin haɓakar Move da kayayyakin more rayuwa

research.title: Bincike
research.description: Binciken fasahar blockchain da ka'idoji na zamani

community.title: Al'umma
community.description: Girma da tallafawa al'ummar masu haɓakawa ta duniya

partnerships.title: Haɗin Gwiwa
partnerships.description: Gina alakar dabaru a cikin yanayin blockchain

hero.title: Tallafa wa Ƙirƙirarku
hero.description: Karɓi tallafi mara biyan kuɗi daga Gidauniyar Dubhe don gina aikace-aikacen Move na buɗe tushe, kayayyakin more rayuwa, da kayan aiki. Duk ayyukan dole su zama cikakku kuma su kammala duk abubuwan da suka kai matsayi.

stats.comingSoon: Yana Zuwa Ba da Jimawa Ba

infrastructure.title: Tallafin Kayayyakin More Rayuwa
infrastructure.description: Gina babban kayayyakin more rayuwa, kayan aikin masu haɓakawa, da kayan aikin yanayin muhalli

dapp.title: Haɓakar DApp
dapp.description: Ƙirƙiri aikace-aikacen da ba su da tushe na zamani akan yanayin Dubhe

research.title: Tallafin Bincike
research.description: Binciken ilimi, inganta ka'idoji, da gudunmawa na ka'ida

community.title: Ayyukan Al'umma
community.description: Ilimi, rubuce-rubuce, kayan aikin al'umma, da shirye-shiryen wayar da kan jama'a

process.title: Tsarin Aikace-aikace
process.description: Tsari mai sauƙi mai matakai 5 don samun tallafin aikinku

proposal.title: Ƙaddamar da Shawara
proposal.description: Ƙaddamar da cikakken shawara tare da cikakkun abubuwan da suka kai matsayi da alkawarin buɗe tushe

review.title: Bitar Gidauniya
review.description: Kwamitin fasaha na Gidauniyar Dubhe ya kimanta yiwuwar da tasirin yanayin muhalli

interview.title: Hirar Ƙungiya
interview.description: Gabatar da tsarin hanyar aikinku da nuna iyawar fasaha

approval.title: Amincewa da Tallafi
approval.description: Hukumar Gidauniya ta amince da tallafi mara biyan kuɗi tare da bukatun abubuwan da suka kai matsayi

delivery.title: Isar da Abubuwan da suka kai Matsayi
delivery.description: Kammala duk abubuwan da suka kai matsayi tare da abubuwan da za a bayar da ke aiki kuma ku karɓi cikakkiyar tallafi

requirements.title: Bukatun Aikace-aikace
items: Cikakkiyar alkawarin buɗe tushe (Ana buƙatar lasisi MIT/Apache 2.0)
Cikakken tsarin haɓakar tushen abubuwan da suka kai matsayi
Ƙungiya mai gogewa tare da tabbataccen rikodin haɓakar aiki
Abubuwan da za a bayar da ke aiki gaba ɗaya - babu samfuri ko nunawa
Kyakkyawan daidaitawa tare da burin ci gaban yanayin Dubhe

successStories.title: Labarun Nasara
successStories.description: Ayyukan da suka karɓi tallafi kuma suka yi babban tasiri

nonRepayable.title: Tallafi Mara Biyan Kuɗi
nonRepayable.description: Duk tallafi kyauta ne marasa sharadi daga Gidauniyar Dubhe. Babu buƙatar biyan kuɗi bayan nasarar kammala abubuwan da suka kai matsayi.

openSource.title: Ana Buƙatar Buɗe Tushe
openSource.description: Duk ayyukan da aka tallafa dole su fito a ƙarƙashin lasisi MIT ko Apache 2.0. Cikakken lambar tushe dole ta kasance ga kowa.

completion.title: Cikakken Kammala Abubuwan da suka kai Matsayi
completion.description: Ayyuka dole su ba da cikakkun software da ke aiki, masu shirye-shirye don samarwa. Dole ne a kammala duk abubuwan da suka kai matsayi don karɓar cikakkiyar tallafi.

finalCta.title: Shirye don Gina Buɗe Tushe?
finalCta.description: Nemi tallafin Gidauniya kuma ka ba da gudummawa ga yanayin Dubhe na buɗe tushe
